dashboard.description:
# Network
The Network compliance score is the *lowest* of 2 sub-scores * **Proxy:** If the endpoint reaches IP addresses that are external or internal. * **Blacklisted domains:** If blacklisted domains are reached or not.
::: configuration * The IP of the proxy must be considered as internal in order to detect external destinations ([read more](https://doc.nexthink.com/Documentation/Nexthink/V6.8/InstallationAndConfiguration/Specifyingyourinternalnetworksanddomains)). * Verify that the [Proxy white list](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Proxy%20white%20list&Type=device) category matches your devices that are allowed to visit external destinations (can be used only if your Proxy is an internal destination). * Verify that the [Compliance](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Compliance&Type=domain) category matches your blacklisted domains. :::
dashboard.name: Network

barChartConfig.title: Number of devices by network score

dashboard.description:
# Network
The Network compliance score is the *lowest* of 2 sub-scores: * **Proxy** If the endpoint reaches IP addresses that are external or internal. * **Blacklisted domains** If blacklisted domains are reached or not.
dashboard.name: Network: Details

metric.label: Device compliance / network/ blacklisted domains list

dashboard.description:
# Device compliance This module provides device compliance metrics. These allow you to quickly spot areas of improvement and take action.
The **trends** help you follow the evolution of the compliance scores and check if the overall compliance is improving or regressing.
The **number of devices by compliance** provides you a precise view of the overall compliance.
# Overview
Starting from the **overview** dashboard, you can compare the compliance **by location**, **device model**, **OS** and **device type**.
The **details** widget shows which areas (e.g. system or software) require more attention.
# Device compliance scores
The compliance score is the average of 4 sub-scores: * **Protection:** Antivirus, antispyware, firewall * **System:** Operating system, privileges * **Software:** Browser, blacklisted softwares, non-compliant software versions * **Network:** Proxy, blacklisted domains
::: tip * The performance is measured over the last 7 days of activity. * Servers and Apple devices are filtered out (but we can still see Apple models with Windows installed). :::
::: configuration **The device compliance score** * The compliance score can be customized to your needs (please contact Nexthink Professional Services). * Each score is computed from multiple sub-scores which are composed of further sub-scores. Add or remove sub-scores as required. * Customize the scores to fit your infrastructure and needs.
**The comparison by worker type**
* Edit the [Remote Worker vs Office Worker Device](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Remote%20Worker%20vs%20Office%20Worker%20Device&Type=device) category on devices to tag devices as remotely connected workers or office based workers.
**The comparison by model**
* Edit the [Model](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Model&Type=device) category on devices to include or exclude specific models. * This allows you to filter out underused models and focus on the main ones.
**The comparison by OS** * Edit the [OS name](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=OS%20name&Type=device) category on devices to filter out some of the marginally used operating systems. :::
dashboard.name: Overview

barChartConfig.title: Number of devices by compliance score

breakdown.value: Remote Worker vs Office Worker Device

metric.label: Device compliance by device type and os

dashboard.description:
# Protection
The protection score is the average of 3 sub-scores: * **Antivirus:** lowest of 3 sub-scores: -- Corporate antivirus - If the corporate antivirus is present or not. -- Antivirus RTP - If the antivirus real time protection is on or not. -- Antivirus up-to-date - If the antivirus is up-to-date.
* **Antispyware:** lowest of 3 sub-scores: -- Corporate antispyware - If the corporate antispyware is present or not. -- Antispyware RTP - If the antispyware real time protection is on or not. -- Antispyware up-to-date - If the antispyware is up-to-date.
* **Firewall:** lowest of 3 sub-scores: -- Corporate firewall - If the corporate firewall is present or not. -- Firewall RTP - If the firewall real time protection is on or not. -- Firewall up-to-date - If the firewall is up-to-date.
::: configuration * Verify that the [Corporate AV](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Corporate%20AV&Type=device) category matches your corporate antivirus. * Verify that the [Corporate AS](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Corporate%20AS&Type=device) category matches your corporate antispyware. * Verify that the [Corporate FW](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Corporate%20FW&Type=device) category matches your corporate firewall. :::
dashboard.name: Protection

barChartConfig.title: Number of devices by protection score

breakdown.value: Remote Worker vs Office Worker Device

metric.label: Device compliance / protection by worker type
Device compliance / protection by device type
Device compliance / protection by device type

dashboard.description:
# Antispyware
The Antispyware compliance score is the *lowest* of 3 sub-scores: * **Corporate antispyware** If the corporate antispyware is present or not. * **Antispyware RTP** If the antispyware real time protection is on or not. * **Antispyware up-to-date** If the antispyware is up-to-date.
# Antivirus
The Antivirus compliance score is the *lowest* of 3 sub-scores: * **Corporate antivirus** If the corporate antivirus is present or not. * **Antivirus RTP** If the antivirus real time protection is on or not. * **Antivirus up-to-date** If the antivirus is up-to-date.
# Firewall
The Firewall compliance score is the *lowest* of 3 sub-scores: * **Corporate Firewall** If the corporate firewall is present or not. * **Firewall RTP** If the firewall real time protection is on or not. * **Firewall up-to-date** If the firewall is up-to-date.
dashboard.name: Protection: Details

dashboard.description:
# Software
The software score is the average of 2 sub-scores: * **Browser:** lowest of 2 sub-scores: -- Non-corporate browsers - If non-corporate browsers are present or not. -- Corporate browser - If the corporate browser is present or not. * **Other Softwares:** lowest of 2 sub-scores: -- Forbidden binaries - If forbidden binaries are present or not. -- Non-compliant binary versions - If specific binary versions are present or not.
::: configuration * Verify that the [Compliance](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Compliance&Type=package) category matches your corporate browser. * Verify that the [Compliance](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Compliance&Type=binary) category matches your blacklisted binaries. :::
dashboard.name: Software

barChartConfig.title: Number of devices by software score

dashboard.description:
# Software compliance
The Software compliance score is the *lowest* of 2 sub-scores: * **Forbidden binaries** If blacklisted binaries are present or not. * **Non-compliant binary vresions** If blacklisted binaries versions are present or not.
# Browser The Browser compliance score is the *lowest* of 2 sub-scores: * **Non-corporate browsers** If non-corporate browsers are present or not. * **Corporate browser** If the corporate browser is present or not.
dashboard.name: Software: Details

metric.label: Device compliance / software/ browser / non corporate browser list

dashboard.description:
# System
The system score is the average of 2 sub-scores: * **Privileges:** lowest of 3 sub-scores: -- Guest account - If the guest account is enabled or not. -- Local admin - If the highest local privilege reached is administrator, super user or standard user. -- Admin account - If the administrator account is enabled or not.
* **Operating system:** lowest of 4 sub-scores: -- Corporate OS - If the operating system is corporate or not. -- OS up-to-date - If the operating system is up-to-date or not. -- OS activation - If the license key is activated or not. -- WMI - If the status of WMI is ok or not.
::: configuration * Verify that the [Local admin white list](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Local%20admin%20white%20list&Type=device) category matches devices that are permitted to have a local administrator. Run [this investigation](nxt://Run-NxInvestigation?Encoding=Url&InvestigationXml=%3C%3Fxml%20version%3D%221.0%22%20encoding%3D%22utf-16%22%3F%3E%3CInvestigation%20xmlns%3Axsd%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2001%2FXMLSchema%22%20xmlns%3Axsi%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2001%2FXMLSchema-instance%22%20DataModelVersion%3D%2212%22%20SyntaxVersion%3D%222%22%3E%3CLabel%3ELocal%20admin%20white%20list%3C%2FLabel%3E%3CObject%3Esource%3C%2FObject%3E%3CPlatforms%3E%3CPlatform%3Ewindows%3C%2FPlatform%3E%3C%2FPlatforms%3E%3CDescription%20%2F%3E%3CFieldList%3E%3Cstring%3Ename%3C%2Fstring%3E%3Cstring%3Escore_9cc0e4befd604d41aeb294a0883926d6%3C%2Fstring%3E%3C%2FFieldList%3E%3CCategoryList%3E%3Cstring%3ELocal%20admin%20white%20list%3C%2Fstring%3E%3C%2FCategoryList%3E%3CAggregateList%20%2F%3E%3CObjectConditionList%20%2F%3E%3C%2FInvestigation%3E) to see the list of devices and tag them manually. * Verify that the [OS compliance](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=OS%20compliance&Type=device) category matches your corporate operating system(s). :::
dashboard.name: System

dashboard.description:
# Operating System
The Operating System compliance score is the *lowest* of 4 sub-scores: * **OS up-to-date** If the operating system is up-to-date or not. * **Corporate OS** If the operating system is corporate or not. * **OS activation** If the license key is activated or not. * **WMI** If the status of WMI is ok or not.
# Privileges
The Privileges compliance score is the *lowest* of 3 sub-scores: * **Guest account** If the guest account is enabled or not. * **Local admin** If the highest local privilege reached is administrator, super user or standard user. * **Admin account** If the administrator account is enabled or not.
dashboard.name: System: Details

metric.label: Devices with bad operating system compliance
